author: abdoulline
body:
Update of widely used _private_ single-pion test (calorimetry scan)  
Now published results look like that (comparing the most recent 10_2_X IB with 10_2_0_pre6):
https://cms-cpt-software.web.cern.ch/cms-cpt-software/General/Validation/SVSuite/HCAL/calo_scan_single_pi/10_X/10_2_0_pre6_vs_102X_SinglePi/

Also added: two profile and two 1D histos for HB/HE RecHits Chi2.
title: [HCAL] single pion test update
